articles.title: Canada offers Ukraine $120M loan as it confronts threat of Russian invasion - CBC News
articles.description: Canada today offered Ukraine a $120 million dollar loan to help the eastern European nation face down what Prime Minister Justin Trudeau called an “aggressive” attempt by Russia to destabilize it.

articles.content:
